name: RHEM IV: The Golden Fragments SE
description: RHEM IV takes you into a huge, fantastic world full of strange vehicles and buildings, secret passages and doorways. A sense of adventure, logic, attentiveness and the ability to solve puzzles will help the player to slowly but surely unveil the mystery of this latest adventure on the island RHEM.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10, XP, Vista Processor: 1,8 Ghz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 850 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 500 MB RAM Storage: 850 MB available space
